msbt.message: OK, I'm just gonna throw this at yaI'm doing a personal challenge to learn a new fact about my neighbors every day. Today, you're it!
Hey! I'm trying to be more neighborly and get to know folks better, and I wanna know about you. That cool?
Alright, uhwhat should I ask you about<10_4 /> Oh!
Hey. I'm trying to remember your favorite kind of , right?
Awesome! Wanted to check. I was tryin' to remember earlier and I justdrew a blank, .
Yo. I'm trying to remember your favorite kind of , right?
Perfect! Was just checkin'. I figure better safe than sorry, !
Remember when I was askin' you about favorite and you said ? That still true?
Cool! I was talkin' to someone from back home and came up for some reason, .My mind wandered and I couldn't remember what you said you liked so ! Got it!
Remember when I was askin' you about favorite and you said ?
Yep! Still is! Yes, it is. Why?
Ah! I was talkin' to someone from back home and came up for some reason, .My mind wandered and I couldn't remember what you said you liked . Got it!
Alright, I'm going bonkers trying to remember. Didn't you say your dream was to be ?
Yeah, I can totally see it. Just keep rockin' how you're rockin', and you'll be there in no time, !
I'm going mad trying to remember Didn't you say your dream gig was ?
Yep, I can totally see it. Just keep rollin' how you're rollin', and you'll get there in no time, !
Weren't you tellin' me you're way into ? That it's, like, your favorite hobby?
Totally is! And it still is!
Oh, nice! I'm asking 'cause I'm kinda interested in , and I wanna know who to bug for tips.So yeah, as long as I don't give up in the first minute, you'll probably be hearin' from me, .
Hey, what was your favorite hobby again? Didn't you tell me you're way into ?
Nice! I ask 'cause I think I'm gonna try .I was just makin' sure I knew who to hit up for tips later, !
I think my memory's gone haywire. Correct me if I'm wrong, but you rock at right?
Yep! I rock! I'm pretty good!
Cool. So I, uhmight need your help putting out a fire I kinda started.If I can't get it all sorted, I'll bug you later, .
My memory's gone haywire. Correct me if I'm wrong, but don't you rock at ?
Yep! I rock! I'm pretty good!
Good. So I, uhmight need your help to get out of a jam I'm in.If I can't get everything sorted, I'll bug you later, .
Alright, so a little bird who may or may not be an actual birdor little told me something about you.
I heard you like way more than other . So is it true?
Ah ha! I was thinkin' you'd be into . That rocks! I love too!I guess we oughta talk more often, .
Ah! I loved when I was little. I just drifted off to other over time, .It's cool to hear you're keepin' that party going, though.
OK, so . I heard you like . True or false?
Ah ha! I was thinkin' you'd be into . Me too!I guess we oughta talk more often, !
Oh! Yeah, when I was little, I used to love .I kinda just drifted to other over time. Glad you're keeping that fire goin', !
OK, I heard you really love your . Like, WAY more than any other .
Yeah, I get it. You just can't beat , .Like, even just hearing you say "" gave me a mega craving for .
Gotta be honest, I was never into . Glad you love it, but there's other for me.
OK, I heard you really love your . Like, more than all .
Yeah, I get it. There's no way to beat good .Like, even just hearing you say that just now gave me a huge craving for .
Gotta be honest, I was never that into .I'm glad you love it, but there's other for me, .
OK, so is your dream actually to be ?
Whoa! That's rad! Hey, I used to wanna be . And I kinda still doWell, it's a LOT of work, but I know you're up to it. You got this!
Gotta be honest, I don't know the first thing about being , .But hey, if that's your dream, then that's your dream. You're gonna rock at it. I know you will!
OK, is really your dream gig?
Oh, rad! is my dream too!Well, it's a LOT of work, but I know you're up to it. You got this!
Gotta be honest, I don't know the scene.But hey, if that's your dream, then that's your dream. You're gonna rock at it. I know you will!
True or false? You are super into .
Yes! OK, we totally gotta hang out way more often. I am all about , .
OK, so I don't know a lot about but so what? That's still cool, .
OK, true or false? You are super into .
Wow! Yes! OK, we totally gotta hang way out more often. 'Cause I am all about .
OK, so I really don't know a lot about But hey, so what? I still think that's pretty cool, .
So, I just wanna check real quick. Is it really true that you're amazing at ?
It's totally true! Yes, I am!
Nice! I actually know a few things about too.Oh! I've got an idea! Let's throw a big party and show off how much we rock at !
Oh, cool! I'm actually kinda lousy at . Now I can bug you when I need a hand!
So, I just wanna check real quick. Is it really true that you're amazing at ?
It's totally true! Yes, I am!
Nice! I actually know a few good tricks too, .Oh! I've got an idea! Let's throw a big party and show off how much we rock at !
Oh, cool! Yeah, I'm actually kinda lousy at .Well, now I know who to bug when I need a hand, !
OK, level with me. You really don't listen to music? Have I got that right, ?
OK, be honest with me. You seriously don't read books? Did I get that right, ?
They're not my thing. Nope. Don't like 'em.
OK, I gotta know. You seriously don't read comics? Have I got that right, ?
They're not my thing. Nope. Don't like 'em.
OK, be real here. You seriously don't watch movies? Did I get that right, ?
They're not my thing. Nope. Don't like 'em.
OK, be real here. You seriously don't watch TV? Have I got that right, ?
They're not my thing. Nope. Don't like 'em.
OK, serious question. You really don't like any sports at all? Did I get that right, ?
They're not my thing. Nope. Don't like 'em.
OK, I gotta know something. You really don't have a favorite drink? Have I got that right, ?
OK, help me out here. You really don't have a favorite food? Did I get that right, ?
OK, so you REALLY don't have a dream you're chasin'? It's fine if you don't, .
OK, be honest. You seriously don't have a favorite hobby? Have I got that right, ?
OK, just checkin'. You really don't have any special skills or talents? Did I get that right, ?
Wellalright. It's fine. Maybe the right thing just hasn't come along for you yet. No worries.
Oh! Alright, sorry about that. I don't know where that came from. Maybe I just imagined it? Who knows.
Huh? But I'm pretty sure that's what you said OK, hit me with it again.
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You're sayin' you DO like .
Wait I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You mean you DO like .
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You're sayin' you DO like .
Wait I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You mean you DO like .
Wait I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You mean you DO wanna be .
Butyou said that before. Oh! You mean IS your dream gig. Gotcha.
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You're sayin' you ARE into .
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh! You mean you ARE into .
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh, I get it! You're sayin' you ARE good at .
Hold up I swear that's what you said before. Oh! You mean you ARE good at .
No? Like, at all? Don't sweat it, it's all good. I was just makin' totally sure, .
Hey, I know, . What kind of music are you into?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite kind of music, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite kind of music is
Now we're talkin'! Those revving guitars and guttural screams just get my blood PUMPIN'!I couldn't possibly count how many metal concerts I've lost my voice to.
Pop, huh? Not my favorite, but yeah, there's a lot of cool stuff there.Still, I gotta say, havin' a song get stuck in your brain for weeks and weeks is a little annoying
Yes! Hip-hop is awesome. The beats, the lyrics, everything. I love how it makes me wanna move!You ever been in, like, a rap battle or a dance-off? I never have, but I've always, ALWAYS, wanted to!
Yeah, you do kinda seem like the type.OK, next time we hang out, you gotta play me some of your favorite . Deal?
Really. Not even in the background when you're cleaning? Well, silence is kinda cool tooI guess.
Hey, I know, . What kind of books do you like to read?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat kind of books do you like, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite kind of books are

Oh yeah! Recipe books rock! I love thumbing through 'em and droolin' over all the tasty stuff I could make. But cookin' ain't easy! I'm trying to remember the last time I didn't torch my dinner and, uhI got nothin'.

Can't beat a good graphic novel! Cool art, clever framing, maybe a galaxy or two in dangeryeah.There's super-meaningful ones out there too, if you know what to look for. Stuff that really makes you think.Yeah, I just love how there's so much to choose from! And that there's all these massive stories to check out!Diving into a back-catalog that's twice as old as I am is seriously one of the best ways to eat a weekend.
Travel guides are so handy! Knowin' where to eat and what to check out on a trip is huge.Sometimes I'll even get 'em for places I'm curious about just to figure out where I wanna go next!
Really! I don't think I've ever tried reading .HmmI wonder if Timmy stocks those. I'm between books right now, so the timing's kinda perfect.
Really? I mean, it's fine. There's tons of ways to read that aren't books.Like, there's magazines, there's websites, or movies with subtitles, or video games Lots of stuff!
Hey, I know, . What kind of comics do you like?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat kind of comics do you like, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite kind of comics are
I'm with you. Good belly laughs are tough to come by. Plus, I love lookin' at goofy, slapstick art.

Action comics! Yes! OK, there's one you GOTTA read where a whole other galaxy is about to crash into ours.A bunch of scientists and robots and aliens open a portal so everyone can escape to another dimension.But then—and this is so cool—then, these gnarly horror-monsters start pourin' in from the other dimension!So now they've gotta fight a huge pan-dimensional invasion AND try to retreat to another dimension!Anyway, it's an epic read. I'll let you borrow it sometime. Oh, and don't bother with the movie. It's AWFUL!

Food comics are rad! I love seeing the main character smash their way around a kitchen in a frenzy.Or reading some heart-warming story about a little makin' her dad's favorite dish.And the last few pages where they show off all that delicious food That does it. Snack time!
Oh! I've been meaning to try readin' some .Hmmshould I research a bit to find a good place to start, or just dive on in?<10_4 /> Ha! I'm gonna dive in! Obviously!
No comics at all? To each their own, I guess. Still, that's kinda surprising. There's a lot of good stuff out there!
Hey, I know, . What kind of movies do you like?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat kind of movies do you like, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite kind of movies are

Yes! I love comedies! Especially when it's a REALLY awkward comedy and the theater's super-crowded.I love looking around and seeing everyone sliding down in their seats when stuff gets weird. Bwa ha ha!
I love action movies, especially on the big screen!Watching a universe-ending kung fu car chase, or an alien-monster space battle just ain't the same at home.
Really? Suspense movies always make me WAY too nervous.Yeah, that's kind of the point, but I wanna be able to go to sleep eventually, you know?
Yep! I've definitely watched my share of .But it's been really long time since I watched any. I think I might bug you for recommendations later.

Yeah, I know a few folks like that. Every time I talk to 'em, all they do is tell me why movies are garbage.And I'm like, why're you tryin' to tell me not to enjoy something I enjoy? C'mon!Sorry, got ranty there. Don't worry. I don't think you're like that. You're cool. They're not. They're jerks.
Hey, I know, . What kind of TV shows do you like?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite kind of TV show?
Help me set the record straight then. Your favorite kind of TV show is
I hear you. Nothing beats curling up in my fuzziest blanket and spacin' out to some laughs after a bad day.

Really! Yeah, I love cooking shows. Sometimes I'll even follow along while I'm watchin', .Except the shows are so short and the cook times are long, so I bump the temperature to speed things up.Anyway, I'm on a first-name basis with the folks at the fire department back home. They're all really friendly.

Travel shows are a blast. Seeing an exotic city, checking out the sites, meeting new facesit's all so cool! But the best part is watchin' clueless tourists eat weird food. The faces they make are the BEST! Bwa ha ha!
Seriously? Wow, I used to watch all the time, !
You don't? Huh That's probably for the best. Sometimes I worry I spend too much time in front of the TV.
Hey, I know, . What's your favorite sport?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite sport, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite sport is

Yeah, basketball's a blast to watch. Especially live! Watching it at home ain't even close to the same thing.Seeing, right in front of you, a clutch three-pointer, or a whole team settin' up an alley-oop So cool!And hearing a hard dunk echo in the arena as the crowd goes nuts? Yes, please!

Boxing, huh? That's cool. I had a phase where I thought I wanted to be a boxer. I got in SO MANY fights.I never even got around to anything like tryouts. Really, I think I was just kinda angry back then And besides, I'm pretty sure the moves I was doing then would've gotten me disqualified anyway.

Yeah! Rugby is intense! Ever look at the players' faces when they're on the pitch? They look SOOO angry.But then they're super friendly after the game. It's real cool how they leave all that aggression on the field!
Cool! I actually don't know a thing about .I actually flipped past some on TV the other day, but I only barely understood what I was seein'.
I get you. Is it just 'cause you're not into competition, or you don't like the games?Or maybe it's the fans. Sometimes fans can make it real tough to enjoy something, and not just with sports
Hey, I know, . What's your favorite drink?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite drink, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite drink is

Yeah, soda's pretty refreshing. I like to drink 'em when I need a breather.I remember there was this one vending machine that would ALWAYS eat my money.I'd put in some change, hit the soda button, hear a bunch of noises, and thennothin'.One time I was having the worst day. Just AWFUL. And all I wanted was a soda and 10 minutes to cool off.Like clockwork, the stupid machine ate my change. Again! I just lost it. I punched that machine SO hard.Well, I guess all the sodas I'd missed out on got stuck in the same spot. I wanted one soda, I got 16!
You like sports drinks? They're alright, I guess.I mean, if I just finished a run or whatever, they're PERFECT. But if not? I think they taste kinda weird.

Keepin' it healthy! Very cool. I like throwin' a bunch of hot sauce into my veggie juice to give it some kick.Except once I put in too much sauce, gulped it down like an idiot, then couldn't taste anything for two days.Yeah It was good to learn my limits, but that probably wasn't the best way to do it.
, huh?I think I've only had that once or twice. I can't even remember if I liked it. Maybe I oughta have it again.
You don't? Tell you what, next time we hang out I'm gonna make you my Special.It's basically with a whoooole lot of mustard. Trust me, it's probably, maybe delicious.
Hey, I know, . What's your favorite food?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite food, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite food is
I love me some sandwiches. They're just about the perfect lazy day food.Like, even if you wanna get super fancy with a sandwich, they still only take about five minutes to make!

French fries are the BEST! They were basically all I wanted for every meal when I was little.That bugged my dad, though. Fries ain't exactly healthy, so he always made sure I ate all my greens too.I remember tryin' to convince my dad that the fluffy white stuff in a fry had all the nutrients I'd ever need.I don't think I'd ever seen him laugh so hard in my life. But then he still made me eat my greens.He was right to, of course. And yeah, I still love me some fries, justalong with other, healthier stuff.
Hey, you gotta enjoy the sweet stuff in life, right? And you could do a LOT worse for sweet stuff than custard!
? Huh!That's rad! Hey, think you could help me figure out a good recipe for ?
I know what you mean. I can't pick a favorite either. There's just way too much crazy-tasty stuff out there.
Hey, I know, . What's your dream job?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your dream job, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your dream job is

Oh awesome! What kind of musician? 'Cause I can totally see you rockin' a stage in front of thousands.But are you wailing on an electric guitar, banging on drums, maybe breakin' out a violinor singing?Yeah, the instrument doesn't matter. You've got musician written all over you. Not a doubt in my mind.

Athlete? Yeah, I can totally see it.So what's your sport? 'Cause I bet you rock at . Or are you more the type? Actually, I can imagine you doing both at the same time. Yeah, if you wanna be an athlete, you got it!
You wanna be a CEO? Awesome! Now THAT is dreamin' big!Honestly, the whole business thing's not for me, but if folks like you are in charge, then stuff's gonna be alright.
OK, now THAT is an awesome dream. ? Wow!You gotta tell me how I can help. Whatever it takes, I'm in.
Hey, that's alright. It took me a while to come up with something too.Well, when you figure it out, let me know. I wanna help however I can!
Hey, I know, . What's your favorite hobby right now?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat's your favorite hobby now, ?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your favorite hobby right now is

Yeah, I love cookingbut everyone always freaks out when I invite 'em over for dinner.Cooking's an art, and I'm an artist. And as an artist, I don't think food needs to TASTE good to BE good.If my inspiration says that I'm makin' with, like, , that's what I'm makin'!I say it's everyone else's loss if they don't wanna eat art.
Oh, cool! Soelectric or acoustic? Ha! Doesn't matter, both rock.Hey, if you ever start a band and need a solid rock-star scream in your lineup, let me know!

Yeah, traveling rocks. Explorin' a new place, eating all kinds of wild food It's so much fun.But my favorite part? Just soakin' up the local vibe of things, and checking out how folks live day-to-day.It's the best kind of eye-opening. I know for a fact that it helped me realize just how alike all of us are.
Oh! I didn't think anyone here was into .That's always been kind of a curiosity for me, really. I have absolutely NO idea if it'd be my thing.
I get you. Sometimes it's tough to find something that sticks.Like, I've got my usuals, surebut I'm also always trying stuff for little while and dropping it.
Hey, I know, . What're you best at? Like, what's your special talent?
Oh! Glad I asked! Sowhat're you best at, ? What's your special talent?
Help me set the record straight then, . Your special talent is
You're a chef? Now THAT's rad! You know, I'm something of a chef myself.Or at least, I like to think so. Burning food is technically cooking, right?
Ha! Of course it is! You're a rock star.Seriously though, that's rad. Let me know when your next gig is comin' up and I'll totally be there.
Oh cool! Now I know who to bug next time my or whatever breaks.
Nice! I didn't think anyone here was good at !Did you, like, go off to some secret hideout and train under a ruthless master for a few years to learn that?
C'mon! That's not true. There's gotta be SOMETHING you're good at.What about Oh! What about being fun to talk to? I know for sure you're good at that 'cause here we are.
